name: Station Mayday
description:
This is my entry for the LibGdx Jam, January 2016.

You must control a crew aboard a damaged station who must keep themselves alive long enough to contact help and be rescued.

I hope you enjoy the game.

Controls:

Left Mouse button to select

Right Mouse button to go back

F1 - help/credits

ESC - quit game
